law.catch_line: There is a Maryland After-School and Summer Opportunity Fund Program....

text.section: There is a Maryland After-School and Summer Opportunity Fund Program.
There is a Maryland After-School and Summer Opportunity Fund in the Program.
The Executive Committee, in consultation with the Advisory Board, shall administer the Program.
The Executive Committee shall use the Maryland Out of School Time Programs' Quality Standards Framework to monitor and assess after-school and summer programs that participate in the Program.
The Maryland Out of School Time Programs' Quality Standards Framework does not supersede applicable child care center licensing regulations.
